exm.mng: body odor, bromhidrosis, armpit odor, underarm stink, also called 狐臭[hu2 chou4]
axillary (botany), budding in the angle between branch and stem
axillary bud, bud growing from axil of plant
many hairs make a fur coat (idiom); many small contributions add up to sth big, many a mickle makes a muckle
lit. armpit, elbow and armpit, fig. right up close (to a disaster), in one's backyard, on one's doorstep
lit. calamity in one's armpit (idiom); a major coup happening on one's doorstep, trouble or danger in one's own backyard
